verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Kikondoo cha Mungu,
mkate wa Mbinguni
Mlishi wa roho zetu,
nakuabudu. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
U Babangu mwema,
na msimamizi
mpaji wa uzima,
wangu mwokozi.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Fumbo abudiwa,
nakuamini
kaza Yesu mpendwa,
yangu imani.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mlo wa roho yangu,
hostia nzima
niwie ya mbingu,
kweli amana.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ee Rabbi mtu Mungu,
unirizishe
njoo shuka kwangu,
kanishibishe.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Anakaribia,
mpenzi amini
atakaingia mwangu
moyoni.
